name: Bootstrap
author: Hassan Derakhshandeh

sections.description: Bootstrap is a toolkit from Twitter designed to kickstart development of webapps and sites. Using this plugin you can easily embed Bootstrap’s scripts and stylesheets to your webpage. You can also pick only the components you want, to avoid loading unnecessary files.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the whole plugin directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Goto Appearance -> Bootstrap and change the options as you like.
  4. Enjoy!
sections.changelog:
0.3.1

  • Minor fix for extra fields in the admin view
  • Implemented the Singleton pattern to make the plugin extendible

0.3

  • Revamped the whole thing!

0.2

  • Updated Twitter Bootstrap to 1.2.0

short_description: Easily include Bootstrap library (or just the parts of it you want) in your website.
description: Bootstrap is a toolkit from Twitter designed to kickstart development of webapps and sites. Using this plugin you can easily embed Bootstrap’s scripts and stylesheets to your webpage. You can also pick only the components you want, to avoid loading unnecessary files.

screenshots.caption: Admin screen. It basically replicates the Customize page on Bootstrap's website with all the options.
